verses.verse: It shall happen, <S%H8085><s%> if you shall listen diligently <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> you on high <S%H5945><s%> above all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

and all these blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H5381><s%> and overtake you, <S%H8085><s%> if you shall listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and you shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your animals, <S%H929><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your livestock, <S%H929><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock. <S%H6629><s%>
Your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your kneading trough <S%H4863><s%> shall be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>
You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> when you come in, <S%H935><s%> and you shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> when you go out. <S%H3318><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> who rise up <S%H6965><s%> against you to be struck <S%H5062><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%> They will come out <S%H3318><s%> against you one <S%H259><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and will flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> ways. <S%H1870><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> on you in your barns, <S%H618><s%> and in all that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to; <S%H1288><s%> and he will bless you in the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you. <S%H5414><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will establish <S%H6965><s%> you for a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to himself, <S%H7650><s%> as he has sworn to you; <S%H8104><s%> if you shall keep the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>

All the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that you are called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall be afraid of you. <S%H3372><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make you plenteous <S%H3498><s%> for good, <S%H2896><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your livestock, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give you. <S%H5414><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will open <S%H6605><s%> to you his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure <S%H214><s%> in the sky, <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand: <S%H3027><s%> and you shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and you shall not borrow. <S%H3867><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H5414><s%> you the head, <S%H7218><s%> and not the tail; <S%H2180><s%> and you shall be above only, <S%H4605><s%> and you shall not be beneath; <S%H4295><s%> if you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do, <S%H6213><s%>

and shall not turn aside <S%H5493><s%> from any of the words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve them. <S%H5647><s%>

But it shall come to pass, <S%H8085><s%> if you will not listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H5381><s%> and overtake you.
You shall be cursed <S%H779><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and you shall be cursed <S%H779><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your kneading trough <S%H4863><s%> shall be cursed. <S%H779><s%>

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your livestock, <S%H504><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock <S%H6629><s%> shall be cursed. <S%H779><s%>
You shall be cursed <S%H779><s%> when you come in, <S%H935><s%> and you shall be cursed <S%H779><s%> when you go out. <S%H3318><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> on you cursing, <S%H3994><s%> confusion, <S%H4103><s%> and rebuke, <S%H4045><s%> in all that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> until you are destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> and until you perish <S%H6><s%> quickly; <S%H4118><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings, <S%H4611><s%> by which you have forsaken me. <S%H5800><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cling <S%H1692><s%> to you, <S%H3615><s%> until he has consumed you from off the land, <S%H127><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you with consumption, <S%H7829><s%> and with fever, <S%H6920><s%> and with inflammation, <S%H1816><s%> and with fiery heat, <S%H2746><s%> and with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and with blight, <S%H7711><s%> and with mildew; <S%H3420><s%> and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you until you perish. <S%H6><s%>
Your sky <S%H8064><s%> that is over your head <S%H7218><s%> shall be brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> that is under you shall be iron. <S%H1270><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust: <S%H6083><s%> from the sky <S%H8064><s%> shall it come down <S%H3381><s%> on you, <S%H8045><s%> until you are destroyed.

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> you to be struck <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies; <S%H341><s%> you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against them, <S%H5127><s%> and shall flee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them: <S%H2189><s%> and you shall be tossed back and forth among all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Your dead body <S%H5038><s%> shall be food <S%H3978><s%> to all birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and to the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and there shall be none to frighten them away. <S%H2729><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you with the boil <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and with the tumors, <S%H2914><s%> and with the scurvy, <S%H1618><s%> and with the itch, <S%H2775><s%> of which you can <S%H3201><s%> not be healed. <S%H7495><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you with madness, <S%H7697><s%> and with blindness, <S%H5788><s%> and with astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart; <S%H3824><s%>

and you shall grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday, <S%H6672><s%> as the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropes <S%H4959><s%> in darkness, <S%H653><s%> and you shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in your ways: <S%H1870><s%> and you shall be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and robbed <S%H1497><s%> always, <S%H3117><s%> and there shall be none to save you. <S%H3467><s%>

You shall betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with her: <S%H1129><s%> you shall build a house, <S%H1004><s%> and you shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: <S%H5193><s%> you shall plant a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and shall not use its fruit. <S%H2490><s%>

Your ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of it: <S%H2543><s%> your donkey shall be violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> from before your face, <S%H6440><s%> and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to you: <S%H6629><s%> your sheep shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and you shall have none to save you. <S%H3467><s%>

Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and fail <S%H3616><s%> with longing for them all the day: <S%H3117><s%> and there shall be nothing in the power <S%H410><s%> of your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> and all your labors, <S%H3018><s%> shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which you don't <S%H3045><s%> know eat up; <S%H398><s%> and you shall be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> always; <S%H3117><s%>
so that you shall be mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of your eyes <S%H5869><s%> which you shall see. <S%H7200><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you in the knees, <S%H1290><s%> and in the legs, <S%H7785><s%> with a sore <S%H7451><s%> boil, <S%H7822><s%> of which you can not <S%H3201><s%> be healed, <S%H7495><s%> from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> to the crown of your head. <S%H6936><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H3212><s%> you, <S%H4428><s%> and your king whom you shall set <S%H6965><s%> over you, <S%H1471><s%> to a nation that you have not known, <S%H3045><s%> you nor your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and there you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>
You shall become an astonishment, <S%H8047><s%> a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and a byword, <S%H8148><s%> among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> where Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall lead you away. <S%H5090><s%>

You shall carry <S%H3318><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> into the field, <S%H7704><s%> and shall gather <S%H622><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> in; <S%H622><s%> for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume it. <S%H2628><s%>

You shall plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and dress <S%H5647><s%> them, <S%H8354><s%> but you shall neither drink of the wine, <S%H3196><s%> nor harvest; <S%H103><s%> for the worm <S%H8438><s%> shall eat them. <S%H398><s%>

You shall have olive trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout all your borders, <S%H1366><s%> but you shall not anoint <S%H5480><s%> yourself with the oil; <S%H8081><s%> for your olives <S%H2132><s%> shall drop off. <S%H5394><s%>
You shall father <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but they shall not be yours; <S%H3212><s%> for they shall go into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
All your trees <S%H6086><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> possess. <S%H3423><s%>

The foreigner <S%H1616><s%> who is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you shall mount up <S%H5927><s%> above you higher <S%H4605><s%> and higher; <S%H4605><s%> and you shall come down <S%H3381><s%> lower <S%H4295><s%> and lower. <S%H4295><s%>
He shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to you, <S%H3867><s%> and you shall not lend to him: <S%H7218><s%> he shall be the head, and you shall be the tail. <S%H2180><s%>

All these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H7291><s%> and shall pursue you, <S%H5381><s%> and overtake you, <S%H8045><s%> until you are destroyed; because you didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which he commanded you: <S%H6680><s%>
and they shall be on you for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder, <S%H4159><s%> and on your seed <S%H2233><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Because you didn't <S%H5647><s%> serve Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness, <S%H8057><s%> and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%> by reason of the abundance of all things; <S%H7230><s%>

therefore you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against you, <S%H7458><s%> in hunger, and in thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and in nakedness, <S%H5903><s%> and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all things: <S%H5414><s%> and he shall put a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> on your neck, <S%H6677><s%> until he has destroyed you. <S%H8045><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against you from far, <S%H7350><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flies; <S%H1675><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose language <S%H3956><s%> you shall not understand; <S%H8085><s%>

a nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> facial <S%H6440><s%> expressions, <S%H5375><s%> that shall not respect the person <S%H6440><s%> of the old, <S%H2205><s%> nor show favor <S%H2603><s%> to the young, <S%H5288><s%>

and shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your livestock, <S%H929><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> until you are destroyed; <S%H8045><s%> that also shall not leave <S%H7604><s%> you grain, <S%H1715><s%> new wine, <S%H8492><s%> or oil, <S%H3323><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your livestock, <S%H504><s%> or the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock, <S%H6629><s%> until they have caused you to perish. <S%H6><s%>

They shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all your gates, <S%H8179><s%> until your high <S%H1364><s%> and fortified <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> come down, <S%H3381><s%> in which <S%H2004><s%> you trusted, <S%H982><s%> throughout all your land; <S%H776><s%> and they shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all your gates <S%H8179><s%> throughout all your land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you. <S%H5414><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your own body, <S%H990><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H4692><s%> in the siege and in the distress <S%H4689><s%> with which your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress you. <S%H6693><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> who is tender <S%H7390><s%> among you, <S%H3966><s%> and very delicate, <S%H6028><s%> his eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward his brother, <S%H251><s%> and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> of his bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and toward the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom he has remaining; <S%H3498><s%>

so that he will not give <S%H5414><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom he shall eat, <S%H398><s%> because he has nothing left <S%H7604><s%> him, <S%H4692><s%> in the siege and in the distress <S%H4689><s%> with which your enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you in all your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

The tender <S%H7390><s%> and delicate <S%H6028><s%> woman among you, <S%H5254><s%> who would not adventure to set <S%H3322><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%> for delicateness <S%H6026><s%> and tenderness, <S%H7391><s%> her eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward the husband <S%H376><s%> of her bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and toward her son, <S%H1121><s%> and toward her daughter, <S%H1323><s%>

and toward her young one <S%H7988><s%> who comes out <S%H3318><s%> from between her feet, <S%H7272><s%> and toward her children <S%H1121><s%> whom she shall bear; <S%H3205><s%> for she shall eat <S%H398><s%> them for want <S%H2640><s%> of all things secretly, <S%H5643><s%> in the siege <S%H4692><s%> and in the distress <S%H6693><s%> with which your enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you in your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

If you will not observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book, <S%H5612><s%> that you may fear <S%H3372><s%> this glorious <S%H3513><s%> and fearful <S%H3372><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> YAHWEH <S%H3068><s%> YOUR GOD; <S%H430><s%>

then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H6381><s%> your plagues <S%H4347><s%> wonderful, <S%H6381><s%> and the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of your seed, <S%H2233><s%> even great <S%H1419><s%> plagues, <S%H4347><s%> and of long continuance, <S%H539><s%> and severe <S%H7451><s%> sicknesses, <S%H2483><s%> and of long continuance. <S%H539><s%>
He will bring <S%H7725><s%> on you again all the diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which you were afraid <S%H3025><s%> of; <S%H6440><s%> and they shall cling to you. <S%H1692><s%>

Also every sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and every plague, <S%H4347><s%> which is not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of this law, <S%H8451><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H5927><s%> them on you, <S%H8045><s%> until you are destroyed.

You shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> in number, <S%H4962><s%> whereas <S%H834><s%> you were as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> for multitude; <S%H7230><s%> because you didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

It shall happen that as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over you to do you good, <S%H3190><s%> and to multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> so Yahweh will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over you to cause you to perish, <S%H6><s%> and to destroy <S%H6><s%> you; <S%H5255><s%> and you shall be plucked from off the land <S%H127><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among all peoples, <S%H5971><s%> from the one end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> even to the other <S%H7097><s%> end of the earth; <S%H5647><s%> and there you shall serve other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which you have not known, <S%H3045><s%> you nor your fathers, <S%H1><s%> even wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

Among these <S%H1992><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> you shall find no ease, <S%H7280><s%> and there shall be no rest <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot: <S%H7272><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you there a trembling <S%H7268><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and failing <S%H3631><s%> of eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and pining <S%H1671><s%> of soul; <S%H5315><s%>

and your life <S%H2416><s%> shall hang <S%H8511><s%> in doubt before <S%H5048><s%> you; <S%H6342><s%> and you shall fear night <S%H3915><s%> and day, <S%H3119><s%> and shall have no assurance <S%H539><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%>

In the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall say, <S%H559><s%> "I wish it were <S%H5414><s%> evening! <S%H6153><s%>" and at evening <S%H6153><s%> you shall say, <S%H559><s%> "I wish it were <S%H5414><s%> morning! <S%H1242><s%>" for the fear <S%H6343><s%> of your heart <S%H3824><s%> which you shall fear, <S%H6342><s%> and for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of your eyes <S%H5869><s%> which you shall see. <S%H7200><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H7725><s%> you into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> with ships, <S%H591><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of which I said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H7200><s%> You shall see it no more again: <S%H3254><s%> and there you shall sell <S%H4376><s%> yourselves to your enemies <S%H341><s%> for bondservants <S%H5650><s%> and for bondmaids, <S%H8198><s%> and no man shall buy you. <S%H7069><s%>
